thread.title: India News | Over 100 Flights Delayed at Delhi Airport Due to Bad Weather
thread.title_full: India News | Over 100 Flights Delayed at Delhi Airport Due to Bad Weather

author: PTI
title: India News | Over 100 Flights Delayed at Delhi Airport Due to Bad Weather
text:
New Delhi, Jan 3 (PTI) More than 100 flights were delayed at the Delhi airport on Friday morning due to bad weather conditions, an official said.
The national capital witnessed dense fog resulting in low visibility. The official said over 100 flights have been delayed but there are no diversions so far.
Also Read | [Chhattisgarh Shocker: Social Media Content Creator Ankur Nath Dies by Suicide on Instagram Live As Followers Watch in Horror in Janjgir Champa.](https://www.latestly.com/india/news/chhattisgarh-shocker-social-media-content-creator-ankur-nath-dies-by-suicide-on-instagram-live-as-followers-watch-in-horror-in-janjgir-champa-6537260.html)
"While landing and takeoffs continue at Delhi Airport, flights that are not CAT III compliant may get affected. Passengers are requested to contact the airline concerned for updated flight information. Any inconvenience caused is deeply regretted," Delhi International Airport Ltd (DIAL) said in a post on X at 6.35 am.
CAT III facility allows aircraft to operate in low visibility conditions. The Indira Gandhi International Airport (IGIA), operated by DIAL, handles around 1,300 flight movements daily.
Also Read | [Coimbatore: Gas Leak After LPG Tanker Overturns on Avinashi Flyover in Tamil Nadu, 5 Schools Closed (Watch Video).](https://www.latestly.com/india/news/coimbatore-gas-leak-after-lpg-tanker-overturns-on-avinashi-flyover-in-tamil-nadu-5-schools-closed-watch-video-6537256.html)
(This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)
